name: gauzily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not very clear: She played the melody, while the rest of the ensemble played the quiet background gauzily. Some of the photos are sharp and clear, while others are gauzily mysterious.
in a soft, rather romantic way: As with so much else he says, the memories materialize from the past, gauzily lit and poignant. Her gauzily beautiful pictures can be found at a gallery in Los Angeles.
More examplesFewer examplesThe show is a heavily scripted, gauzily edited reality show.The short stories range in time, gauzily, from the 1960s to the 1990s.
